meanings.definition: a breed of domestic cat known for its silver-blue coat
meanings.sent1: The korats at the shelter were all friendly and playful.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of korats at the cat show last weekend.
meanings.sent3: My neighbor's korats love to chase after butterflies in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The korats in the cattery shimmered like the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The korats' unique silver-blue fur made them stand out among other cats.

meanings.definition: the plural form of the word 'korat', referring to multiple cats of this breed
meanings.sent1: Many korats gathered around the food bowls during feeding time.
meanings.sent2: The korats in the household all had distinct personalities.
meanings.sent3: The korats' synchronized movements during playtime were a joy to watch.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the gentle purring of the korats.
meanings.sent5: The korats' playful antics brought laughter to the family every day.

meanings.definition: the possessive form of the word 'korat', indicating ownership or association with the breed
meanings.sent1: Sarah's korats enjoy lounging in the sun by the window.
meanings.sent2: The korats' toys were scattered all over the living room floor.
meanings.sent3: The korats' curiosity often led them to explore new hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: The korats' purrs filled the house with a comforting melody.
meanings.sent5: The korats' graceful movements captivated everyone who watched them.
